title: Circulation of the blood
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional and Beryl Denman Lacey
brief_description: A study, mainly in animated diagram, of the systematic and pulmonary circulation of the blood in the human body; showing the structure and functions of the heart, lungs, arteries, veins and capillary network. The route of the blood, the heart cycle and the exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide in the air sacs of the lungs and the cells of the body are shown in detail.
